hero.title: Get Personalized Videos from Your Favorite Creators
hero.subtitle: Book personalized video shoutouts for any occasion. Make someone's day special with a unique message from their favorite creator.

choose.title: 1. Choose a Creator
choose.description: Browse our diverse roster of talented creators and find the perfect match for your video message.

request.title: 2. Request a Video
request.description: Tell us about your occasion and what you'd like the creator to say in your personalized video.

receive.title: 3. Receive & Share
receive.description: Get your unique video delivered to your inbox and share the magic with your loved ones.
